divs: Sighting DetailsMy co-worker and I were at work having lunch in my office in downtown Denver (15th floor). I looked up and I could see the sky through the window. I asked her "what's that"?. She replied it's a military helicopter. I laughed and said "No way. That's not a helicopter and it's not a plane either". She laughed and said "what is it then...a UFO". I told her to walk over to the window and get a better look. She did but lost sight of it for a moment. However, I could still see the object moving from where I was sitting and told her where to look. As I motioned to get up to get a better look, I noticed it was moving slow, stopping and moving again before it disappeared right front of us. It didn't go through a cloud or anything, it just simply vanished from our sights. Almost as if it knew we were looking at it. The location of the UFO was about 2 or 3 miles Southeast of the State Capitol and about 20,000 ft in the air. I am not that great at guessing distance in the air but I would say that 20,000 ft is an ok guess. My friend and I are government employees and we are both honest people. She has never seen a UFO before and I have had over 50 sightings since 1997. The funny thing is, I am starting to see more and more solid objects in the sky and not just unusual lights in the night sky.
trends: There have been 185 other sightings in Denver
There were no other sightings in Denver on or around January 20th 2010
